languages.text: "Боится... да, страха в этом щенке хватит на небольшой отряд".
"He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."
languages.original_text: "Боится... да, страха в этом щенке хватит на небольшой отряд".

traits.locale_text: "Afraid... yes, there is enough fear in this lad for a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Afraid... yes, there is enough fear in this lad for a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Afraid... yes, there is enough fear in this lad to infest a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Afraid... yes, there is enough fear in this lad to infest a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to infest a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「彼は恐れている…そうだな、この少年には小隊を養うだけの恐怖がある」
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は恐れている…そうだな、この少年には小隊を養うだけの恐怖がある」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “他吓坏了……是啊，这家伙身上的恐惧，足以喂饱一整支黑暗灵族小队。”
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: “恐惧……是啊，这个小伙子身上的恐惧，足以感染一支小分队。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Il a peur... Oui, ce bougre a autant de peur en lui que toute une escouade. »
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: « Peur... Oui, ce bougre a autant de peur en lui que toute une escouade. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene miedo... Sí, este muchacho desprende tanto miedo como para contagiárselo a un pequeño escuadrón».
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que sí, este muchacho desprende tanto miedo como para contagiárselo a un pequeño escuadrón».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Er hat Angst ... Ja, in diesem Burschen steckt genügend Angst, um einen kleinen Trupp zu nähren."
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: "Angst ... ja, in diesem Burschen steckt genügend Angst, um einen kleinen Trupp anzustecken."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Çekiniyormuş. Sahi... Bu keratadaki ödleklik, ufak bir mangaya yeter."
languages.original_text: "He is afraid... Yes, there is enough fear in this runt to feed a small squad."

traits.locale_text: "Çekiniyormuş... Sahi, bu keratadaki ödleklik ufak bir mangaya yeter."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
